content: > this pattern is available for ** free on > my blog here 1 ** the downloadable pdf listed > for sale contains full pattern > including important notes stitch > guide written instructions chart and > complete photo-tutorial in one > printable file without advertisements nya infinity mosaic blanket is a continious version of nya mosaic blanket it is made in a special crochet technique with only basic stitches the pattern can be followed either with chart or written instructions with a little bit of attention and concentration you will create a bright and unique gift for yourself or your friends the blanket is adjustable and can be made in any size **level** advanced beginner **materials ** fingering yarn in 2 contrasting colors for a small sample i used our tribe yarn by scheepjes but scheepjes whirl yarn will give the best results crochet hook 3 5mm e or size needed to obtain the same gauge scissors yarn needle to weave in ends 1 https //www lillabjorncrochet com/2019/07/nya-infinity-mosaic-blanket html
